mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of Mary Harman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of Mary Harman Jacob Hylton, Administrator S.G. Conduff, Administrator Nonnie Conduff, Daughter James Harman, Son Margaret Hylton, Daughter Laura G. Benes, Granddaughter Samuel I. Conduff, Grandson Lura A. Conduff Daniel W. Conduff, Grandson Charles E. Conduff, Grandson Recorded in Ledger Book 5, Folio 38-39, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
